DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate whether anodal tDCS over the left M1 leads to a decrease of GABA concentration and alterations of functional brain connectivity in older people, compared to sham tDCS.
DOC.brief_title: tDCS Effects on GABA Concentration and Brain Functional Connectivity in Older Adults of Retirement Age
